item.description: Come celebrate the Eve of the 2010 winter Olympics with a party to Support the Bragan Skier Athlete Scholarship sponsored by the Wedeln's.   We will have our own recipient on this year's Olympic team and are getting together to have some fun and raise a some money for our scholar athletes. Location will be Hot Shotz  1293 Main St Leominster with live music by Wonder Box from 9-1. We will also be having a golf event of our own on the Golden tee machine and the Wachusett Brewery will be the featured beer of the evening. A $2 cover gets you in the door and all that goes to the scholarship. The date is February 11th and more information will be available on  www.braganscholarship.com Please check out the Flyer for this event http://files.meetup.com/687583/Microsoft%20Word%20-%20bragan-winterfest.docx.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: Look for anyone wearing "wedeln" labeled gear, there will be many of us.
item.name: Bragan Skier Scholarship night at Hot Shotz
